artifact.title: Artifacts
artifact.noArtifacts: No artifacts found. Create one to get started.
artifact.selectArtifactPrompt: Select an artifact to view files
artifact.selectFilePrompt: Select a file from the tree to view its content
artifact.deleteArtifactDescription: Are you sure you want to delete artifact
artifact.deleteArtifactWarning: ? This action cannot be undone and will delete all files associated with this artifact.
artifact.deleteFileDescription: Are you sure you want to delete file
artifact.uploadFileDescription: Configure the upload settings for your file
artifact.uploadPathHelp: The directory path where the file will be uploaded (e.g., /folder/)
artifact.uploadPathHelpLocked: Path is set to the selected folder. Only root directory uploads allow path customization.
artifact.noMetaFields: No meta fields added. Click "Add Field" to add custom metadata.
